name: strand-tabs
description: A fully-styled component for presenting tabbed content

attributes.name: tabBarPosition
attributes.description: The side of the content container to display the tabs

attributes.name: tabBarOffset
attributes.description: The amount of space, in px, between the first tab and the edge of the container

attributes.name: inner
attributes.description: Use the alternate style tabs, for a set of tabs inside another tab

attributes.name: selectedIndex
attributes.description: The index of the current selected tab. This can be changed to selected a different tab.

attributes.name: items
attributes.description: Returns an array of this component's tabs, in order
